name: R4B-PackagedProductDefinition-R5-PackagedProductDefinition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B PackagedProductDefinition into FHIR R5

element.display: A medically related item or items, in a container or package

target.display: A medically related item or items, in a container or package
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition`

element.display: Allows the key features to be recorded, such as "hospital pack", "nurse prescribable"

target.display: Allows the key features to be recorded, such as "hospital pack", "nurse prescribable"
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.characteristic` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.characteristic` - characteristic removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/package-characteristic; characteristic has change due to type change: R4B characteristic CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 characteristic

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.contained`

element.display: A total of the complete count of contained items of a particular type/form, independent of sub-packaging or organization. This can be considered as the pack size

target.display: A total of the complete count of contained items of a particular type/form, independent of sub-packaging or organization. This can be considered as the pack size. See also packaging.containedItem.amount (especially the long definition)
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.containedItemQuantity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.containedItemQuantity`

element.display: If the drug product is supplied with another item such as a diluent or adjuvant

target.display: Identifies if the drug product is supplied with another item such as a diluent or adjuvant
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.copackagedIndicator` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.copackagedIndicator`

element.display: Textual description. Note that this is not the name of the package or product

target.display: Textual description. Note that this is not the name of the package or product
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.description` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.description`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.id`

element.display: A unique identifier for this package as whole

target.display: A unique identifier for this package as whole - not for the content of the package
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0

element.display: The legal status of supply of the packaged item as classified by the regulator

target.display: The legal status of supply of the packaged item as classified by the regulator
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply`

element.display: The actual status of supply. In what situation this package type may be supplied for use

target.display: The actual status of supply. In what situation this package type may be supplied for use
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.code`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.id`

element.display: The place where the legal status of supply applies

target.display: The place where the legal status of supply applies
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.jurisdiction` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.jurisdiction`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.legalStatusOfSupply.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Manufacturer of this package type (multiple means these are all possible manufacturers)

target.display: Manufacturer of this package type (multiple means these are all possible manufacturers)
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.manufacturer` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.manufacturer`

element.display: Allows specifying that an item is on the market for sale, or that it is not available, and the dates and locations associated

target.display: Allows specifying that an item is on the market for sale, or that it is not available, and the dates and locations associated
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.marketingStatus` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.marketingStatus`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: A name for this package. Typically as listed in a drug formulary, catalogue, inventory etc

target.display: A name for this package. Typically as listed in a drug formulary, catalogue, inventory etc
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.name` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.name`

element.display: A packaging item, as a container for medically related items, possibly with other packaging items within, or a packaging component, such as bottle cap
A possible alternate material for this part of the packaging, that is allowed to be used instead of the usual material
The item(s) within the packaging
The number of this type of item within this packaging
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
The actual item(s) of medication, as manufactured, or a device, or other medically related item (food, biologicals, raw materials, medical fluids, gases etc.), as contained in the package
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
An identifier that is specific to this particular part of the packaging. Including possibly a Data Carrier Identifier
Manufacturer of this package Item (multiple means these are all possible manufacturers)
Material type of the package item
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Allows containers (and parts of containers) within containers, still a single packaged product
General characteristics of this item
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
A code expressing the type of characteristic
A value for the characteristic
The quantity of this level of packaging in the package that contains it (with the outermost level being 1)
Shelf Life and storage information
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

The shelf life time period can be specified using a numerical value for the period of time and its unit of time measurement The unit of measurement shall be specified in accordance with ISO 11240 and the resulting terminology The symbol and the symbol identifier shall be used
Special precautions for storage, if any, can be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary. The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified

This describes the shelf life, taking into account various scenarios such as shelf life of the packaged Medicinal Product itself, shelf life after transformation where necessary and shelf life after the first opening of a bottle, etc. The shelf life type shall be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
The physical type of the container of the items
The product that this is a pack for

target.display: The product that this is a pack for
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.packageFor` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.packageFor`

element.display: The status within the lifecycle of this item. High level - not intended to duplicate details elsewhere e.g. legal status, or authorization/marketing status

target.display: The status within the lifecycle of this item. High level - not intended to duplicate details elsewhere e.g. legal status, or authorization/marketing status
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.status`

element.display: The date at which the given status became applicable

target.display: The date at which the given status became applicable
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.statusDate` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.statusDate`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.text`

element.display: A high level category e.g. medicinal product, raw material, shipping container etc

target.display: A high level category e.g. medicinal product, raw material, shipping container etc
target.comment: R4B `PackagedProductDefinition.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `PackagedProductDefinition.type`
